attributes.action: Ban pesticides which kill bees in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Bees are the most important insects on the planet, if they die out humans do too.
Bees are already under terrific pressure killing them with pesticides it totally unacceptable.
attributes.background: Ban pesticides which kill bees in the UK the same as the EU have.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Overturn the decision to allow the use of neonicotinoid pesticides
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569214

Continue the ban on the use of Neonicotinoids
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563943
